record.title: ORDER FOR COMMITTEES TO REPORT LEGISLATIVE AND EXECUTIVE CALENDAR BUSINESS ON MAY 31, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that on Thursday, May 31, from 10 a.m. to 12 noon, notwithstanding the recess of the Senate, the Senate committees may report legislative and executive calendar business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
